prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sharp teeth and a vibrant color scheme.
I want a fish Pokemon that has a fierce look and bright colors.
Generate an aquatic creature that boasts both blue and red hues.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a shark with striking features and a bold design.
Imagine a Pokemon that can thrive in both the ocean and urban environments.
Design a Pokemon with spiky fins and a playful yet aggressive demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of water and has a unique shape.
